localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights
blogPost.body: Been working on an icon set off and on over the last year, and I am finally releasing V1 today! What You'll Get: • Sketch File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights • Figma File - 150+ Line Icons In thin, standard, & thicc Weights
blogPost.title: Friendly Line Icon Set - 150+ meticulously crafted line icons
blogPost.author: Eddy Gann

localize.description: 在过去的一年里，我一直在断断续续地研究一个图标集，今天我终于发布了V1! 你会得到什么。- 草图文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标 - Figma文件 - 150多个细线型、标准型和薄型的图标。
在過去的一年裏，我一直在斷斷續續地研究一個圖標集，今天我終於發佈了V1! 你會得到什麼。- 草圖文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標 - Figma文件 - 150多個細線型、標準型和薄型的圖標。

previous.excerpt: An email drop by Snazzy AI. In a single click, write emails to pitch investors or potential customers.
previous.title: AI Emails by Snazzy - Pitch angels, VC’s or potential users with GPT-3

localize.description: 由时时彩人工计划群投的一封邮件。只需点击一下，就可以写邮件向投资者或潜在客户推销。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、风险投资人或潜在用户进行推介

localize.description: 由時時彩人工計劃羣投的一封郵件。只需點擊一下，就可以寫郵件向投資者或潛在客戶推銷。
localize.tagline: 用GPT-3向天使、風險投資人或潛在用戶進行推介

next.excerpt: Alertly is your personalized slack bot for getting JIRA alerts. Set up important reminders, which are actionable and personalized so that the right person gets notified, all from Slack!
next.title: Alertly.io - Your personalized slack bot for JIRA alerts

localize.description: Alertly是您个性化的Slack机器人，用于获取JIRA提醒。设置重要的提醒，这些提醒是可操作的和个性化的，以便正确的人得到通知，所有这些都来自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您个性化的JIRA警报懒惰机器人

localize.description: Alertly是您個性化的Slack機器人，用於獲取JIRA提醒。設置重要的提醒，這些提醒是可操作的和個性化的，以便正確的人得到通知，所有這些都來自Slack!
localize.tagline: 您個性化的JIRA警報懶惰機器人
